title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 451.1 - Scope of the rules in this part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 451.1 - Scope of the rules in this part

State Regulations

The rules in this Part specify criteria for sound level
measurement systems which are used to make the sound level measurements
specified in Part 452 and Part 453 of this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
451.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
